WellnessEntry.title: WellnessEntry
WellnessEntry.description: Represents a single, self-contained wellness check-in entry with denormalized data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the wellness entry.

date.description: ISO string representing the date and time when the wellness entry was created.

specificEmotions.description: An array of selected Level 3 emotions (e.g., 'Pleased', 'Content').

sensations.description: An array of physical sensations experienced.

thoughts.description: An array of identifiers for any thought patterns noticed.

/users/{userId}/wellnessEntries/{wellnes.description: Stores all wellness entries for a specific user. Each document is self-contained.
